All Classes

Class Description
ActionHandler
ActionHandler class handle the action when user click on the button, with the help of the CalcUtil class and the Calculator class.
Assertion
Assertion class is designed to help the developer in debugging process, This class print the message to Output-Stream if the assertion is enabled for the project which uses this.
To enable Assertion :
Command-Prompt :
"java -ea -jar MSCalculator.jar" should do it on the command prompt.

VS Code :
goto- "Run and Debug(Ctrl + Shift + D)" >> On top drop-down menu select "Add Configuration"
Then, (new launch.json file will open),
Add(with quotes), "vmArgs": "-enableassertions" , under the Configurations section.
and, Save the file.

OR
goto the link- "https://stackoverflow.com/questions/54024007/how-to-enable-java-assertions-in-visual-studio-code"

Eclipse :
goto- Run >> Run_Configurations >> Java_Applications(left_sidebar) >> MainLauncher >> Arguments
Then, type "-ea" or "-enableassertions" under VM Arguments section
Click, Apply and Run.

OR
goto the link- "https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5509082/eclipse-enable-assertions"

IntelliJ :
goto the link- "https://stackoverflow.com/questions/18168257/where-to-add-compiler-options-like-ea-in-intellij-idea"
ButtonType
ButtonType enumeration help to differentiate the button in the CalcButton class.
CalcButton
CalcButton class used to design buttons specially for MSCalculator by extending the JButton class of the JavaSE and with the help of style and theme.
CalcField
CalcField class used to set-up the JTextField according to the MSCalculator.
Calculator
Calculator class is the core class of MSCalculator, which actually perform the arithmetic operations.
CalcUtilities
CalcUtilities class help the ActionHandler class to perform the calculation process.
DefaultStyle
DefaultStyle is the default style and size of the frame, buttons and their fonts used in the GUI of this Calculator.
DefaultTheme
DefaultTheme is the default Color theme for this Calculator.
FormatUtilities
FormatUtilities class help the ActionHandler to manipulate the field text, All Utilities/Methods are handle some part of the manipulation.
GridBagPanel
GridBagPanel is a convenient way of using gridbaglayout as the layout of the JPanel.
GUIHandler
GUILauncher class handle the gui functioning of this Calculator, Moreover, The key listener and the action listener is also add, to the component accordingly, here in this class.
MainLauncher
MainLauncher is the starting point of this Calculator, Moreover, it also set it's look and launch the GUI Handler class, Which handle the further execution.
Style
Style interface help program to set the Style and Scale of the frame, buttons and their fonts used in this Calculator.
Theme
Theme interface help to guide the program to make a new Theme for this Calculator.
